channel.title: Tele other command?
channel.description: how do i make a command where i can teleport other people to a certain place? like ::sendtothemoon (user

item.title: Tele other command?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("movehome") && c.playerRights >= 2) { try { String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(9); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.teleportToX = COORD X; c2.teleportToY = COORD Y; c2.heightLevel = c.heightLevel; c.sendMessage("You have teleported " + c2.playerName + " to Home"); c2.sendMessage("You have been teleported to home"); } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

Read full topic
